title: Леди Босс
overview: Based on the bestseller of the same name by Daria Istomina. Continuation of the series "Lady Homeless". The desperate adventurer Liza Basargina, who gets away with it in any situation, is faced with wealth and bankruptcy, love, betrayal and new love. The killer's shot aimed at businessman Semyon Tumansky hits his bodyguard. Nobody knows who ordered the murder. No one except Tumansky's closest friend and former partner - Ken and his henchmen. Ken is informed that all of T Corporation's property has been transferred to Lizaveta's name. He unsuccessfully tries to turn all the people loyal to her against the new mistress. Unknown people kidnap Lisa's adopted son. She's panicking. The appearance of a husband who has arrived from abroad is a gift of fate for her. But Tumansky is more concerned about the idea of taking revenge on Ken.
